q1.question: Is this real crypto trading?
q1.answer: No, MemeLaunch Tycoon is 100% simulation. No real money involved.

q2.question: How do I earn coins?
q2.answer: Trade meme coins, create popular coins, and complete achievements.

q3.question: Can I withdraw my coins?
q3.answer: No, all coins are virtual and for game purposes only.

q4.question: Is it free?
q4.answer: Yes! 100% free to play. No credit card required.
